name: Cyclebreaker (itch) (janistch)
description:
Defend the heart!

Defend the heart against an infinite horde of enemies. Launch yourselves into the enemy to destroy them!

Controls

Click anywhere to launch, and click again to pull back.

Background

This game was made in 3 Hours for Trijam #203: The 3 hour game jam!

The theme of the jam was "Cycle is broken". In the game, you break out of the cycle to attack enemies.
